caption: Detection
name: detection
description: The detection object describes suspicious activities detected by a rule-based or analytics engine.

attacks.description: The array of attacks identified by the detections or analytics.

desc.description: The description of detections or analytics rule that produced the detection.

end_time.description: The end time of a detection time period.

ref_event_uid.description: The identifier of the event associated with the detection.

start_time.description: The start time of a detection time period.

type_id.description: The type identifier of the detection.

uid.caption: UID
uid.description: The unique identifier of the detection.
